devdoc.details: This contract represents a carbon credit market where users can buy and sell carbon credits.

buy(uint256,address,uint256).details: Allows a buyer to purchase carbon credits from a project.

params._cctAmount: The amount of carbon credits to purchase.
params.companyAddress: The address of the company selling the carbon credits.
params.projectId: The ID of the project from which to purchase the carbon credits.

checkSufficientStake(uint256,uint256).details: Check whether or not a company has provided enough Ether to stake for a project (for penalty purposes).

params._cctAmount: The amount of cct they wish to sell from the project.

sell(uint256,uint256).details: Allows a seller to list and sell carbon credit tokens (CCT) for a specific project.

params._cctAmount: The amount of CCT to be sold.
params.projectId: The ID of the project for which the CCT is being sold. The seller must have enough CCT listed for the project and sufficient CCT balance to sell. If the project is completed, the CCT is transferred to the market and the seller receives ether. If the project is ongoing, the seller must stake 130% of the CCT amount in ether. The seller's ether is transferred to the contract for staking, with 30% being a penalty. The CCT is listed and the project is added to the seller's list of projects. Emits a `ReturnCredits` event with the seller's address and the amount of CCT sold.

validateProject(address,uint256,bool,uin.details: Validate a project by a validator, and handle penalty if project is invalid, otherwise transfer CCT to buyers.

params.actualCCT: The actual CCT (Carbon Credit Token) amount for the project.
params.isValid: A boolean indicating whether the project is valid or not.

withdrawEther(address,uint256).details: Allows the contract owner to withdraw a specified amount of Ether from the contract balance and transfer it to a specified company address.Throws an error if the specified amount is greater than the contract balance.

params.amount: The amount of Ether to be withdrawn and transferred.
params.companyAddress: The address of the company to which the Ether will be transferred.

devdoc.title: CarbonCreditMarket

validateProject(address,uint256,bool,uin.notice: This function can only be called by a validator.

withdrawEther(address,uint256).notice: Only the contract owner can call this function.
